    • Field Detail

      • balance

        private int balance
        Creating attributes for the class. The first int is used to desribe the player's balance. The other int is used to put a limit to the player's balance so that it can never drop below 0.

        private int MIN

    • Method Detail

      • addBalance

        public int addBalance(int point)
        Method used for adding money to the player's balance, this is also used to subtract money from the balance.
        Parameters:
        point - the int value that is added to the balance. minBalance is a method used here to make sure that the player's balance never goes below 0.
        Returns:
        Balance
